General.Description: Gnosis was built as a revolutionary market-driven forecasting technology to let shape the future. By building on the Ethereum protocol, Gnosis provides the users a decentralized prediction market. Besides, it is an open platform, therefore, anyone can predict the outcomes and customized prediction market applications. Moreover, GNO has the Dutch Exchange is a fully decentralized exchange for ERC-20 token used to incentivize long-term participation in the Gnosis platform.
General.Features: GNO is safe for users because it of Gnosis multisig wallets. Moreover, the alpha version of our prediction market platform, provides participants with a playful environment to try out trading in preduction markets and tokens.
General.Technology: Gnosis is built on Ethereum, a next generation blockchain protocol. As a decentralized, permissionless platform, it is easy as possible for others to create prediction market applications on top of GNosis.
